song_lyrics: Hā re guṇ Prabhunā ame gāshu gavrāvshu re... °ṭek
Hā re prīt Prabhumā ame karshu karāvshu re... 1
Kām ne krodh vaḷī doṣhne nivārshu,
Hā re dharma niyam pāḷī ne paḷāvshu re... 2
Hā re dhyān Prabhunu ame dharshu dharāvshu re... 3
Hā re nyāy nīti rākhīne rakhāvshu re... 4
Hā re saheje sansār ame tarshu tarāvshu re... 5
title: Jīvan vitāvshu re sadā satsangmā

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-117: Vallabhdas

Category: Yogiji Maharajna Pad
